message.content:
cs.HCI, cs.MM, cs.CV, cs.IR, cs.CL. 

The paper focuses on developing an interactive video summarization system that combines video understanding with direct interface manipulation to help users control the summarization process. This involves designing an interface that allows users to specify a time budget for the remaining content while watching a video, and an algorithm that determines which parts to skip or fast-forward based on the user's input. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.HCI (Human-Computer Interaction), followed by cs.MM (Multimedia), cs.CV (Computer Vision), cs.IR (Information Retrieval), and cs.CL (Computation and Language) as the paper involves natural language processing techniques to analyze video content.
